name: AnxietyAssessment
title: Anxiety Assessment
description: Assessment of the person's anxiety (Business ID: Entry 611476)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Anxiety Assessment.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's anxiety.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Anxiety Assessment.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Anxiety Assessment.)

Is your fear unreasonable - that is, much stronger than it should be [CIDI-SF]
Is your fear much stronger than in other people [CIDI-SF]
Were you ever afraid that you might faint, lose control, or embarrass yourself in other ways [CIDI-SF]
Do you worry that you might be trapped without any way to escape [CIDI-SF]
Did any of these attacks occur when you were in a life-threatening situation [CIDI-SF]
Do you worry that help might not be available if you needed it [CIDI-SF]
Did any of these attacks occur when you were not in a life-threatening situation [CIDI-SF]
About how many attacks have you had in your life [#] [CIDI-SF]
Did you ever have a spell or an attack when all of a sudden you felt frightened, anxious, or very uneasy [CIDI-SF]
Did you ever have an attack when you were not in a situation that usually causes you to have unreasonably strong fears [CIDI-SF]
Did you ever tell a professional about these problems - medical doctor, psychologist, social worker, counselor, nurse, clergy, or other helping professional [CIDI-SF]
How long have you had any of these fears [CIDI-SF]
What is the longest period of time that this kind of worrying has ever continued [CIDI-SF]
During that period, was your worry stronger than in other people [CIDI-SF]
Did you worry most days [CIDI-SF]
Did you usually worry about one particular thing, such as your job security or the failing health of a loved one, or more than one thing [CIDI-SF]
Did you find it difficult to stop worrying [CIDI-SF]
Did you ever have different worries on your mind at the same time [CIDI-SF]
How often was your worry so strong that you couldn't put it out of your mind no matter how hard you tried [CIDI-SF]
How often did you find it difficult to control your worry [CIDI-SF]
Did you take medication or use drugs or alcohol more than once for the worry or the problems it was causing [CIDI-SF]
How much did the worry or anxiety interfere with your life or activities [CIDI-SF]
How often do you get upset when you are in that situation [CIDI-SF]
How many Mos have you had any of these fears [CIDI-SF]
How much have any of these fears ever interfered with your life or activities [CIDI-SF]
Have you ever been very upset with yourself for having any of these fears [CIDI-SF]
When you have sudden anxiety attacks, do they usually occur in specific situations that cause you unreasonably strong fear [CIDI-SF]
How long ago did you have the most recent attack [CIDI-SF]
Did some of your attacks happen in a situation when you were not in danger or not the center of attention [CIDI-SF]
I get scared in small, closed places [SCARED-R]
Have you ever had a period lasting one month or longer when most of the time you felt worried, tense, or anxious [CIDI-SF]
Did you ever have a time when you worried a lot more than most people would in your situation [CIDI-SF]

When you have panic attacks do you experience this thing [CIDI-SF]
